availability.p: Licensed under a [Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International License](http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/). Available at ####.

notesStmt.note: Corrections are welcome either through GitHub, the project website (www.opentext.org), or a direct email to Christopher D. Land.

sourceDesc.p: The SBL Greek New Testament (SBLGNT) is a critically edited edition of the Greek New Testament produced by the Society of Biblical Literature and Logos Bible Software, made available under a [CC-BY License] (https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/). Available at https://github.com/LogosBible/SBLGNT.

Contextual speaking turns were derived by Christopher D. Land using projection data in the original [OpenText annotation](https://github.com/OpenText-org/GNT_annotation_v1.0) together with the capitalization of the SBLGNT edition. Manual error correction was then carried out by Christopher D. Land and Doosuk Kim.

Turn segments were derived by Ryder A. Wishart by modifying the pericope headings of Robinson and Pierpont's Greek New Testament, which is in the public domain. Differences can be identified by comparing this data to the start and end tokens compiled by [James Tauber](https://github.com/jtauber/vocabulary-tools/blob/master/gnt_data/pericopes.txt).

Move segments were derived by Christopher D. Land by modifying syntax markup copyright 2014-2017 by the Global Bible Initiative, made available under under a [CC-BY-SA License] (http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/). Available at https://github.com/biblicalhumanities/greek-new-testament/tree/master/syntax-trees/sblgnt.

Supplementary morphological data by James K. Tauber, made available under a [CC-BY-SA License] (http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/). Released as "MorphGNT: SBLGNT Edition. Version 6.12." Available at https://github.com/morphgnt/sblgnt.

Values were generated by Christopher D. Land, derived in part from syntax markup copyright 2014-2017 by the Global Bible Initiative, made available under under a [CC-BY-SA License] (http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/). Available at https://github.com/biblicalhumanities/greek-new-testament/tree/master/syntax-trees/sblgnt.
